description.zh-cn: 中国汉族弓弦乐演奏家、民族音乐理论家。曾任中央民族乐团团长、党委副书记，是中国共产党和中国音乐家协会的成员，并担任多届全国政协委员。
description.en: A Chinese bow string instrumentalist and national music theorist of Han ethnicity. He served as the director and deputy party secretary of the China National Traditional Orchestra, is a member of the Communist Party of China and the Chinese Musicians' Association, and has served as a member of multiple sessions of the National Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家级民族管弦乐团。
description.en: A national-level traditional orchestra in the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 第十一届全国政协委员

zh-cn: 第十一届全国政协委员

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议第十一届全国委员会的委员群体。
description.en: The group of members of the 11th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

nodes.id: 第十二届全国政协委员

zh-cn: 第十二届全国政协委员

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议第十二届全国委员会的委员群体。
description.en: The group of members of the 12th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国政协委员

zh-cn: 第十三届全国政协委员

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议第十三届全国委员会的委员群体。
description.en: The group of members of the 13th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 由中国音乐家组成的群众性团体，是中国文学艺术界联合会的团体会员。
description.en: A mass organization composed of Chinese musicians, and a group member of the China Federation of Literary and Art Circles.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 席强担任中央民族乐团团长、党委副书记。
description.en: Xi Qiang served as the Director and Deputy Party Secretary of the China National Traditional Orchestra.

relationships.target: 第十一届全国政协委员

description.zh-cn: 2008年当选第十一届全国政协委员，代表文化艺术界，分入第二十八组。
description.en: Elected as a member of the 11th National Committee of the CPPCC in 2008, representing the culture and arts sector and assigned to Group 28.

relationships.target: 第十二届全国政协委员

description.zh-cn: 席强是第十二届全国政协委员，此信息来源于页面分类。
description.en: Xi Qiang was a member of the 12th National Committee of the CPPCC, as indicated by the page category.

relationships.target: 第十三届全国政协委员

description.zh-cn: 2018年1月当选第十三届全国政协委员。
description.en: Elected as a member of the 13th National Committee of the CPPCC in January 2018.

description.zh-cn: 席强是中国音乐家协会会员，并曾担任其第七届和第八届理事会理事。
description.en: Xi Qiang is a member of the Chinese Musicians' Association and served as a council member for its 7th and 8th councils.

description.zh-cn: 席强是中国共产党党员，此信息来源于页面分类。
description.en: Xi Qiang is a member of the Communist Party of China, as indicated by the page category.
